import React ,{useState} from 'react' import './booking.css' import {Form,FormGroup,ListGroupItem,ListGroup,Button} from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({tour,avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews} = tour const[credentials,setCredentials] = useState({ userId:"01", userEmail:"example@gmail.com", fullname:'', phone:'', guestSize:'', bookAt:'' }) const handleChange = e =>{ setCredentials(prev=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) } //send data to server const handleClick = e =>{ e.preventDefault() console.log() } return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating ===0? null:avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
Information
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service Charge
$10
Total
$109
) } export default Booking
